title: Core Ancestries
description: Complete data for the 8 core ancestries including heritages and ancestry feats

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Stoic and stern people with unbridled zeal for artisanship

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Darkvision
specialAbilities.description: See in darkness and dim light as well as bright light (black and white)

specialAbilities.name: Clan Dagger
specialAbilities.description: Free clan dagger at birth, selling it is taboo

dwarf.physicalDescription: Short and stocky, about a foot shorter than humans, pride in long hair and beards

culturalTraits.society: Mountain Sky Citadels, passion for stonework/metalwork/family
culturalTraits.beliefs: Honor, tradition, hard work, friendship, justice, Torag worship

heritages.name: Ancient-Blooded Dwarf
heritages.description: Dwarven heroes could shrug off magic, some resistance manifests in you

ability.name: Call on Ancient Blood
ability.trigger: Attempt saving throw against magical effect
ability.effect: +1 circumstance bonus to triggering save and other saves vs magical effects until end of turn

heritages.name: Death Warden Dwarf
heritages.description: Ancestors were tomb guardians, power to ward off death passed on

ability.effect: Success on save vs void trait or undead creature becomes critical success

ability.heatTolerance: Treat environmental heat effects as one step less extreme

heritages.name: Rock Dwarf
heritages.description: Ancestors lived among ancient stones, solid as rock when planted

ability.stability: +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude/Reflex DC vs Reposition/Shove/Trip
ability.savingThrows: +2 vs spells/effects that force movement or knock prone
ability.forcedMovement: Moved only half distance when forced to move 10+ feet

heritages.name: Strong-Blooded Dwarf
heritages.description: Blood runs hearty and strong, can shake off toxins

ability.poisonSaves: Successful saves reduce stage by 2 (1 for virulent), critical success by 3 (2 for virulent)

1st.name: Dwarven Doughtiness
1st.description: Naturally calm and collected in face of danger
1st.effect: At end of turn, reduce frightened condition by 2 instead of 1

1st.name: Dwarven Lore
1st.description: Absorbed old stories and traditions of ancestors
1st.effect: Trained in Crafting and Religion, gain Additional Lore feat for Dwarf Lore

1st.name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
1st.description: Affinity for hard-hitting weapons over elegant arms
1st.effect: Access to dwarf trait weapons, treat martial dwarf weapons as simple, advanced as martial, critical specialization at 5th level

1st.name: Mountain Strategy
1st.description: Mastered ancient tactics against common foes
1st.effect: +1 circumstance damage vs giant/goblin/hryngar/orc traits, scales with weapon dice

1st.name: Rock Runner
1st.description: Navigate stone and rocky terrain with ease
1st.effect: Ignore difficult terrain from rubble/uneven stone, +2 Acrobatics on stone surfaces

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Ancient people with historical perspective, value kindness, intellect, and beauty

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Low-Light Vision
specialAbilities.description: See twice as far in dim light as humans

elf.physicalDescription: Taller than humans, fragile grace, pointed ears, large vibrantly colored pupils

culturalTraits.society: Individualistic, bear grudges (ilduliel), keep personal names secret
culturalTraits.lifespan: Physical adulthood ~20, emotional maturity ~100, live to ~600 years

heritages.name: Ancient Elf
heritages.description: Lived multiple lives, versatility from past experience

ability.effect: Gain multiclass dedication feat for another class

ability.coldTolerance: Treat environmental cold effects as one step less extreme

ability.darkvision: Gain darkvision instead of low-light vision

heritages.name: Whisper Elf
heritages.description: Hearing sharp enough to count cotton threads

ability.seekBonus: +2 to Perception to Seek hidden/undetected creatures
ability.concealment: Reduce flat check DCs for concealed/hidden by 2

ability.forestCover: Can Take Cover while in forest terrain

1st.name: Ancestral Longevity
1st.effect: During daily preparations, gain trained proficiency in one skill until next prep

1st.name: Elven Lore
1st.effect: Trained in Arcana and Nature, gain Additional Lore feat for Elf Lore

1st.name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
1st.effect: Access to elf trait weapons, treat martial elf weapons as simple

1st.name: Forlorn
1st.description: Extended exile or solitude hardened you
1st.effect: +1 to saves vs emotion, +2 vs being controlled by another

1st.name: Nimble Elf
1st.effect: Speed increases by 5 feet

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Fey-descended folk prone to eccentricity, threatened by the Bleaching

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Low-Light Vision
specialAbilities.description: See twice as far in dim light as humans

gnome.physicalDescription: Just over 3 feet tall, vibrant colors, wide range of skin/hair/eye colors

culturalTraits.society: Adopt regional practices selectively, fluid family boundaries, complex names
culturalTraits.lifespan: Physical maturity ~18, live ~400 years if avoid Bleaching
culturalTraits.beliefs: Fey connections, curiosity, avoiding Bleaching through new experiences

heritages.name: Chameleon Gnome
heritages.description: Skin and hair change color for camouflage

ability.camouflage: +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth when skin/hair match environment

ability.feyTrait: Gain fey trait in addition to gnome and humanoid
ability.primalCantrip: One primal cantrip at will, changeable during daily preparations

heritages.name: Sensate Gnome
heritages.description: One of your senses is extraordinarily acute

ability.locateBonus: +2 circumstance to locate undetected creatures within scent range

ability.darkvision: Gain darkvision instead of low-light vision

heritages.name: Wellspring Gnome
heritages.description: Magic flows through you from unknown source

ability.magicTradition: Choose arcane, divine, or occult tradition
ability.cantrip: Gain one cantrip from chosen tradition at will

1st.name: Animal Accomplice
1st.effect: Gain a familiar

1st.name: Animal Elocutionist
1st.effect: Speak with animals of Small size or smaller, +1 circumstance to Make Impression on them

1st.name: Fey Fellowship
1st.description: Fey blood gives kinship with fey creatures
1st.effect: +2 Perception vs fey, +2 saves vs fey, immediate Diplomacy to Make Impression on fey

1st.name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
1st.effect: Access to gnome trait weapons, treat martial gnome weapons as simple

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: Small folk living in the moment, creative and honest, love songs, fire, and eating

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Darkvision
specialAbilities.description: See in darkness and dim light as well as bright light (black and white)

goblin.physicalDescription: ~3 feet tall, large heads, scrawny limbs, green/gray/blue skin, regenerating teeth

culturalTraits.society: Follow strong leaders, tribes rarely >100, bonds with allies, simple names
culturalTraits.lifespan: Adolescence ~3, adulthood ~4-5, live 50+ but few survive past 20
culturalTraits.beliefs: Live in moment, creative, honest, love songs/fire/eating

heritages.name: Charhide Goblin
heritages.description: Charred skin from exposure to fire

ability.persistentFire: DC 10 flat check to remove persistent fire damage instead of DC 15

heritages.name: Irongut Goblin
heritages.description: Can subsist on garbage and debris

ability.subsist: Can eat non-food objects to subsist
ability.poisonResistance: +2 circumstance to saves vs ingested afflictions and sickened condition

ability.jawsAttack: Jaws unarmed attack: 1d6 piercing damage, finesse trait

ability.coldTolerance: Treat environmental cold effects as one step less extreme

ability.bonusHP: 10 Hit Points from ancestry instead of 6

1st.name: Burn It!
1st.effect: Fire damage bonus = half spell rank or 1/4 item level with fire spells/alchemical items

1st.name: City Scavenger
1st.description: Know how to survive in urban environments
1st.effect: +1 circumstance to Subsist in settlements, can use Society instead of Survival

1st.name: Goblin Lore
1st.effect: Trained in Nature and Stealth, gain Additional Lore feat for Goblin Lore

1st.name: Goblin Scuttle
1st.effect: Step when ally moves adjacent to you

1st.name: Goblin Song
1st.effect: Performance check to inflict -1 penalty on enemy saves vs mental effects

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Short, resilient people with remarkable curiosity and humor

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Keen Eyes
specialAbilities.description: Sharp eyes allow you to find concealed and hidden things
specialAbilities.effect: Imprecise sense to find hidden doors, traps, and similar features

halfling.physicalDescription: ~3 feet tall, proportioned like small adults, typically brown hair

culturalTraits.society: Optimistic, kind, value comfort and security, travel in family groups

heritages.name: Gutsy Halfling
heritages.description: Optimism and courage in face of danger

ability.emotionResistance: +1 circumstance to saves vs emotion and Will saves
ability.fearResistance: Critical success on saves vs fear effects

heritages.name: Hillock Halfling
heritages.description: Accustomed to living in mild climates

ability.environmentalResistance: +2 to saves vs environmental heat and cold
ability.climateAdaptation: Treat environmental temperature effects as one step less extreme

ability.bonusLanguages: Additional languages equal to half Intelligence modifier
ability.settlementBonus: +1 circumstance to Society and Survival in settlements

1st.name: Distracting Shadows
1st.description: Use small size to create diversions
1st.effect: Create Diversion action doesn't trigger reactions

1st.name: Halfling Lore
1st.effect: Trained in Acrobatics and Stealth, gain Additional Lore feat for Halfling Lore

1st.name: Halfling Luck
1st.effect: Reroll natural 1 on save (keep new result even if worse)

1st.name: Sure Feet
1st.description: Steady on your feet regardless of ground
1st.effect: +2 circumstance to Acrobatics vs Balance and Reflex saves vs falling prone

1st.name: Titan Slinger
1st.description: Tradition of facing creatures much larger
1st.effect: Deal full damage with slings vs Large or larger creatures

human.name: Human
human.description: Diverse and adaptable people with wide potential and deep ambitions

alternateBoosts.description: Humans already use free boost system

specialAbilities.name: Bonus General Feat
specialAbilities.description: Adaptability grants extra feat at 1st level

human.physicalDescription: Diverse appearances, wide variety in all physical traits

culturalTraits.society: Extremely diverse, adapt to any environment or culture
sampleNames: Regional variation - adapt to local cultures

ability.skillTraining: Become trained in one skill of choice
ability.skillFeat: Gain skill feat for that skill

ability.bonusFeat: Gain additional general feat at 1st level (total of 2)

heritages.name: Wintertouched Human
heritages.description: Bloodline includes ice or winter fey

ability.coldAdaptation: Treat environmental cold as one step less extreme

1st.name: Adapted Cantrip
1st.description: Through study, gained minor magical ability
1st.effect: Choose spell tradition, gain one cantrip from that tradition

1st.name: Cooperative Nature
1st.effect: +4 circumstance bonus when using Aid action

1st.name: General Training
1st.effect: Gain 1st-level general feat

1st.name: Haughty Obstinacy
1st.effect: +1 circumstance to Will saves, +2 vs being controlled

1st.name: Natural Ambition
1st.effect: Gain 1st-level class feat

leshy.name: Leshy
leshy.description: Immortal nature spirits placed in small plant bodies, seeking worldly experience

alternateBoosts.description: Two free boosts instead of standard boosts/flaws

specialAbilities.name: Low-Light Vision
specialAbilities.description: See twice as far in dim light as humans

specialAbilities.name: Plant Nourishment
specialAbilities.description: Can subsist on sunlight, soil, and water instead of food

leshy.physicalDescription: Small plant bodies housing immortal nature spirits

culturalTraits.society: Guardians of nature, immortal but curious about mortal world
culturalTraits.lifespan: Immortal nature spirits in temporary plant bodies
culturalTraits.beliefs: Nature protection, curiosity about mortality, ecological balance

ability.healingFruit: Can offer fruit from body to heal others

ability.sporeCloud: Can create cloud of spores for various effects

ability.shell: Can retract into shell for protection

heritages.name: Leaf Leshy
heritages.description: Made of leaves with gliding capability

ability.glide: Can glide to reduce falling damage

heritages.name: Vine Leshy
heritages.description: Flexible vine body with climbing abilities

ability.entangle: Can use vines to entangle enemies

1st.name: Grasping Limbs
1st.description: Roots and branches aid in climbing
1st.effect: +2 circumstance to Athletics for climbing

1st.name: Leshy Lore
1st.effect: Trained in Nature and one Lore skill about local terrain

1st.name: Seedpod
1st.effect: Seedpod ranged unarmed attack

1st.name: Woodland Stride
1st.effect: Ignore difficult terrain from vegetation

orc.name: Orc
orc.description: Proud, strong people with hardened physiques who value physical might and glory

alternateBoosts.description: Can use standard two free boosts instead

specialAbilities.name: Darkvision
specialAbilities.description: See in darkness and dim light as well as bright light (black and white)

orc.physicalDescription: Muscular builds, green skin, prominent tusks, powerful frames

culturalTraits.society: Honor through combat, clan-based society, respect strength and glory
culturalTraits.beliefs: Honor, strength, glory in battle, clan loyalty

ability.combatPreparation: Benefits to initiative and combat readiness

1st.name: Orc Ferocity
1st.effect: When reduced to 0 HP, remain conscious for one more action

1st.name: Orc Sight
1st.effect: See in darkness as easily as dim light

1st.name: Orc Superstition
1st.effect: +1 circumstance to saves vs magic, can Step when targeted by spell

1st.name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
1st.effect: Access to orc trait weapons, treat martial orc weapons as simple
